roleset.name: cause to be immobile

example.name: Financial sense
example.text: They immobilized assets that might have been more productively employed.
example.arg: assets that might have been more productively employed.

example.name: Medical
example.text: They immobilized my leg and put me on the stretcher.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: The railroaders' strike gave them control of Russia's means of communication, allowing them to spread word of the strike throughout the empire, while their immobilization of rail traffic forcibly idled many trades and industries.

roleset.note: IMMOBILIZE-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel entries to VN, PB and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. No appropriate VN etnry found. (from immobilize.01-v)
